author: Alexis Simendinger and Al Weaver
title: The Hill's Morning Report - Presented by Facebook - House set to pass $483B COVID bill; Lawmakers jockey over next package
content:
Presented by Facebook
Welcome to The Hills Morning Report. Its Thursday. We get you up to speed on the most important developments in politics and policy, plus trends to watch. Alexis Simendinger and Al Weaver are the daily co-creators, so find us @asimendin… [+27065 chars]
